short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that will help in Advance Automation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension useful for Advance automation. 
AA helper is part of different services provided by Advance automation. We provide automation solutions to our users. 
this extension will allow user to one click login from https://app.advanceautomation.tech/
On Advance Automation System User stores login information for different websites like tax filing website, PMS logins etc... 
We want to allow our user to access their PMS/logins in one click. So, when user click on the website link on https://app.advanceautomation.tech/ AA helper extension will become active and will auto fill username/password and will process login. 
This way AA Helper helps users to perform one Click login.
